nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify that greyed-out formula or override indicator is visible in leave policy configuration when payroll daily wage calculator is configured
checks.selector_hint: Look for greyed-out formula field or override messaging in unpaid leave calculation method section
checks.assertion: Override indicator should be present and visible to indicate payroll settings take precedence

checks.description: Navigate to leave policy unpaid leave configuration to verify override state display
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method
checks.assertion: Navigation path should be accessible and lead to unpaid leave calculation configuration

checks.description: Verify that formula field shows disabled or greyed-out state indicating override from payroll settings
checks.selector_hint: Formula input field or display area in day calculation type section
checks.assertion: Formula field should display in disabled/greyed state or show precedence messaging

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing global configuration takes precedence over policy-level settings
checks.selector_hint: Override messaging or disabled field indicator in calculation method section
checks.assertion: Override indicator should clearly show that global unpaid leave daily rate configuration supersedes policy settings

checks.description: Navigate to leave policy configuration to access unpaid leave calculation settings
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Navigation should successfully reach leave policy unpaid leave configuration area

checks.description: Verify calculation method field state reflects global configuration override
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method dropdown or field in unpaid leave configuration
checks.assertion: Field should display state indicating global configuration takes precedence

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Navigate to End of Service eligibility configuration page
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure
checks.assertion: Navigation path should be accessible and lead to EOS configuration

checks.description: Verify UI displays daily wage formula configuration and calculation method settings
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage formula display area, salary components section, calculation method dropdown
checks.assertion: UI should display formula (basic + allowances / 30) and calculation method options as configured

checks.description: Verify remarks or labels display the configured daily rate and calculation basis
checks.selector_hint: Remarks field or label showing daily rate calculation
checks.assertion: Remarks should display the stored daily rate and calculation basis used for pro-rated amounts

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing policy-driven calculation configuration
checks.selector_hint: Override messaging or disabled field in day calculation type section
checks.assertion: Override indicator should show that leave salary calculation is policy-driven

checks.description: Navigate to leave policy configuration for unpaid leave calculation method
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method
checks.assertion: Navigation should reach leave policy unpaid leave calculation configuration

checks.description: Verify day calculation type field displays configured divisor (30 or 31 days)
checks.selector_hint: Day calculation type dropdown or field showing divisor configuration
checks.assertion: Field should display the configured day divisor for leave salary calculations

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Navigate to leave policy unpaid leave configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Navigation should reach leave policy unpaid leave configuration area

checks.description: Verify remarks field displays correct number of days for the month (e.g., 29 for February in leap year)
checks.selector_hint: Remarks field showing daily rate calculation with day count
checks.assertion: Remarks should display the correct calendar days for the month (29 for February leap year, 31 for January, etc.)

checks.description: Verify daily rate display in remarks reflects correct calendar days
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate value and day count in remarks section
checks.assertion: Daily rate remarks should show correct day divisor matching actual calendar days

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Navigate to leave policy unpaid leave configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method
checks.assertion: Navigation should reach leave policy calculation method configuration

checks.description: Verify daily rate display shows rate from leave occurrence month, not payroll processing month
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate field or remarks showing the rate used for deduction
checks.assertion: Daily rate should display the initially calculated rate from leave occurrence month

checks.description: Verify remarks display stored daily rate from leave occurrence month
checks.selector_hint: Remarks field showing daily rate and month reference
checks.assertion: Remarks should display the daily rate calculated at time of leave request, not recalculated from payroll month

checks.description: Navigate to Daily Wage Calculator from Settings > Payroll > Daily Wage Calculation
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu > Payroll > Daily Wage Calculation
checks.assertion: Navigation path should be accessible and lead to Daily Wage Calculation configuration

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options are available (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis dropdown or radio button options
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options should be present: calendar days, working days, custom days

checks.description: Verify salary components selection controls exist for configuring which components to include
checks.selector_hint: Salary components section with checkboxes or multi-select
checks.assertion: Salary components selection interface should be present and allow choosing components to factor into calculations

checks.description: Verify options to exclude weekends and public holidays are available
checks.selector_hint: Exclusion options for weekends and public holidays
checks.assertion: Options to exclude weekends and public holidays should be present in calculation configuration

nav.canonical: End of Service Eligibility > Salary Components > Calculation Method

checks.description: Navigate to End of Service eligibility configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure
checks.assertion: Navigation path should be accessible and lead to EOS configuration

checks.description: Verify salary component options (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances) are available
checks.selector_hint: Salary components selection in EOS configuration
checks.assertion: Options for Basic Only and Basic + Allowances should be present for leave encashment configuration

checks.description: Verify calculation method options (calendar days, working days, custom days) are available
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method dropdown in EOS configuration
checks.assertion: All three calculation method options should be available: calendar days, working days, custom days

checks.description: Verify ability to configure specific leave types for end-of-service calculations
checks.selector_hint: Leave type configuration section in EOS settings
checks.assertion: Interface should allow configuration of individual leave types for EOS calculations

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing which eligible paid leave-type policies will be overwritten
checks.selector_hint: Override messaging or indicator in leave type configuration
checks.assertion: Super admin should see indication of which eligible paid leave-type policies will be overwritten

checks.description: Navigate to Daily wage calculation settings from Settings > Payroll
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > Daily wage calculation
checks.assertion: Navigation path should be accessible and lead to daily wage calculation configuration

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options (custom days, calendar days, working days) are available
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis selection in daily wage calculation
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options should be present: custom days, calendar days, working days

checks.description: Verify save button and functionality for proration settings changes
checks.selector_hint: Save button in daily wage calculation configuration
checks.assertion: Save button should be present and functional to apply proration setting changes

checks.description: Verify warning or messaging about rejecting prorated salary transactions when payroll month is open
checks.selector_hint: Warning message or notification about active prorated transactions
checks.assertion: UI should display messaging about need to reject and resave prorated transactions when payroll month is open
